stream_def: mux name=mux ! pantilt port=@PANTILT.PORT@ max_speed=1000 speed_threshold=1 speed_threshold=100 speed_span_post=100 cod=5,0 ! mjpeg_tegra_decoder ! ptpvf_generator vr180=0 size=@APP.SIZE@ npq=@PTPVF.NPQ@ path=@FILE_PATH@

stream_params.ptpvf_generator: pcuda_remapper name=remapper edge_r="0.1" s=@OWIDTH@x@OHEIGHT@ ho=1 sync=1 ! v4l2_tegra_encoder name=encoder fps=1 ii=1 br=@APP.BITRATE_KBPS@
